name: perl-class-inspector

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Get information about a class and its structure

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-file-sharedir
dependent_to.description: File::ShareDir - Locate per-dist and per-module shared files

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: biopieces
dependent_to.description:
The Biopieces are a collection of bioinformatics tools that can be
pieced together in a very easy and flexible manner to perform both
simple and complex tasks.
